 Stay tuned for the latest news alerts and updates from the Travel Pal team! If you wish to contact us, write to support@hellopal.com You'll hear from Travel Pal Police if we think you might have violated our terms of service. Hopefully, we'll never have to contact you through this channel, ever! This new Travel Pal version can only work after completely uninstalling
 the previous version. Please uninstall Hello Pal and install it again. Sorry for the hassle!

Otherwise, you won't be able add your Google+ friends to Travel Pal. Travel Pal will now reset all locally-stored content. This is an official Travel Pal account. Travel Pal does not have appropriate frames for chosen settings. Sorry, but your application has been declined. Please make sure that the mobile, email and ID of both you and your trip pal are verified. Trip Subsidies Meal subsidy: Transportation subsidy: Apply Now Apply Application being processed..a Application approved! Application Requirements Apply for a meal subsidy (between US$%s to $%s ) and treat your guest to local food, on us Apply for a transportation subsidy to (between US$%s to $%s ) help cover the travel costs of meeting with your host! Application Requirements Host and traveler must each have verified ALL of the following: email, ID AND mobile. Personal profile must be fully completed. The more details you include in your profile, the higher the likelihood of getting the subsidy. You may only apply for the subsidy ONCE for each trip, so make sure you read all requirements before applying! Processingyour application needs up to 7 working days. Please check your email or check back here to view the latest status. Surprise Gift(Free T-shirt)
During the promotion, users who applied for subsidies will have a chance to get a free t-shirt with travel pal logo on it.The number of T-shirt is limited. Hurry to apply for one.(see more details at email).

You or your partner are not meet the application conditions Star User Star User Status You're now a Star User! You now have the following privileges: Why become a Star User? Application Requirements Stand out even more from other Trusted Users by applying for Star User status! As a Star User, others will be able to trust you even more as each Star User has been manually approved by our staff. You Trust Score is 'Perfect'. All profile items must be completed(the more detail the better). You have posted Moments (the more the better). We will manually review each application and take into account all factors, including quality of your profile pictures and description, authenticity, frequency of usage, any reports by others against you, etc.Further requirements may be communicated to you by email on a case-by-case basis. Star Users will be displayed on a priority basis in search results, making you more easily searchable. Get a special badge next to your name to show that you can be trusted! Search Results Priority: Special Badge: NOTE: Star User status may be revoked at any time,eg. if your profile has been modified and no longer meets our Star User requirements, or if you receive reports against you by others. Such determinations will be made at our sole discretion. Canceling your booking will also cancel your subsidy application. Proceed? Apply Cancel Application successfully submitted! Processing your application needs 1 to 2 working days. Please check your email or check back here to view the latest status.
